parameters.name: Base64
parameters.description: Specifies whether to decode the value by using Base 64. If you call the [PutKv](~~2850482~~) operation and set the Base64 parameter to true, set this parameter to true to read the original content.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: The key name for the query.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The name of the namespace that you specify when you call the [CreateKvNamespace](~~2850317~~) operation.
